title: I don't know what happened to my mac
body: When I enter the game it only have 1/4 of the screen and i can't even play!! plz help me{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} , here is my email plz help me haoyangli0618@gamil.com

replies.body: Oh noes! Sounds like you've run into an issue we're still [**working on a hard fix**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nxyEq9WA-532017-14-screen-directx-error-issues) for. Until we can roll out a fix for everyone at once, there are a few steps we can take to try and fix this on our own. Since you're running a Mac, let's try hitting Cmd+Enter to toggle between fullscreen and windowed to see if that helps!
